member.name: HELPINFO
member.summary: Contains information about an item for which context-sensitive help has been requested.

summary.para: The type of context for which help is requested. This member can be one of the following values.

item.description: HELPINFO_MENUITEM: Help requested for a menu item.
HELPINFO_WINDOW: Help requested for a control or window.

member.name: HELPINFO.iCtrlId
member.summary: The identifier of the window or control if iContextType is HELPINFO_WINDOW, or identifier of the menu item if iContextType is HELPINFO_MENUITEM.

member.name: HELPINFO.hItemHandle
member.summary: The identifier of the child window or control if iContextType is HELPINFO_WINDOW, or identifier of the associated menu if iContextType is HELPINFO_MENUITEM.

member.name: HELPINFO.dwContextId
member.summary: The help context identifier of the window or control.

member.name: HELPINFO.MousePos
member.summary: The structure that contains the screen coordinates of the mouse cursor. This is useful for providing help based on the position of the mouse cursor.
